excerpts: The creme brûlée latte was amazing and the pesto toast was also really great.
Right next to golden gate park so that's also a plus.
The staff was extremely nice and it's a great place to get some work done.
pesto toast.author: Vicky M.
pesto toast.review: The creme brûlée latte was amazing and the pesto toast was also really great. Right next to golden gate park so that's also a plus. The staff was extremely nice and it's a great place to get some work done.

excerpts: Their avocado toast is delicious (presentation is on point) and for those with a sweet tooth, their ube waffle is to die for!
ube waffle.author: Denise T.
ube waffle.review:
Absolutely love this coffee spot! I've tried a couple of drinks here (all of which are fantastic), but their black sesame latte is my recent FAVORITE! Trust me, it's a game changer. I've tried both the iced and hot versions and they're both AMAZING AS F.

In addition to coffee, they offer a variety of other creative items on their menu. Their avocado toast is delicious (presentation is on point) and for those with a sweet tooth, their ube waffle is to die for! So many more items on the menu that I need to try.

The owners and staff are also super nice and friendly, and attract a lot of regulars in the neighborhood (myself included). It's a popular spot with really great ambiance to study/work -- if only this place was around back in my college days!

Highly suggest checking this place out if you haven't yet. Trust me, you won't regret it!

excerpts: Ube Waffle - Recommended!
Beautiful presentation with vibrant purple ube colors mixed with a dusting of powdered sugar.
ube waffle.author: Sheila C.
ube waffle.review:
Featured creative lattes like Whopper, Creme Brulee, and Peanut Butter along with trendy bites like avocado toast, corn toast, ube or matcha waffles, and chia pudding, this is a one-stop shop for your caffeine fix AND tasty eats. 

Ube Waffle - Recommended!  Beautiful presentation with vibrant purple ube colors mixed with a dusting of powdered sugar.  The waffles were pleasantly fluffy and soft in the center with crisp edges.

Chia Pudding - Feeling healthy?  Go for the chia pudding topped with fresh blueberries and cinnamon.  Or do what I did and go halfsies on waffles / chia pudding to splurge a little and be conscientious.

Whopper Latte - I didn't get too much of a malted chocolate flavor aside from some whopper bits on top, but I was pleasantly surprised that the latte was not jaw-achingly sweet.  Kudos to them for not going overkill on sugar like many other places do.

excerpts: I had the Ube waffle, it's visually stunning.
Aesthetically very pleasing to the eye, they definitely made an effort.
I can't get over it, my picture doesn't do it justice.
It does taste good
ube waffle.author: Madison Z.
ube waffle.review:
I've never paid attention to this place until recently. A lot of coffee places have opened up and if you think about it, they all do the same. 

What made me try this place out was their waffles. I always had a thing for waffles, so here I am baby! I had the Ube waffle, it's visually stunning. Aesthetically very pleasing to the eye, they definitely made an effort. I can't get over it, my picture doesn't do it justice. It does taste good but I think I'm loving it more because it's so attractive. 

I'll come here over Stacks, any day.

excerpts: Not a big fan of the Ube waffle I had especially came for.
ube waffle.author: Karen L.
ube waffle.review:
The Avocado toast is simply delicious, even though it's pricey.  It is just a piece of toast with avocado spread all over sprinkled with some chili flakes and a soft boiled egg.  But it was so good.  I was just a tad disappointed my egg didn't leak like the pictures people have been posting.  

Not a big fan of the Ube waffle I had especially came for.  The waffle was a bit dry and a bit plain, even though there's a side of ube paste with it.

I also ordered the Black sesame latte, which was pretty good.  Not overly sweet, only issue I was bothered with was that there was a layer of sesame on the bottom that didn't seem to have mixed well with the rest of the drink.

excerpts: Gotta try the Ube waffle next time!
ube waffle.author: Jennifer H.
ube waffle.review:
The Matcha waffle and the black sesame latte were delicious. The waffle (6.25 not bad) wasn't too sweet and with just the right amount of syrup so that it wasn't to dry. The taste of matcha was just right as well. Gotta try the Ube waffle next time! 

Everyone was super friendly, and there was a decent amount of space making it a great spot to work as well!

excerpts: Would come back to do work and try other unique items like the Ube waffle!
Only con is the price.
ube waffle.author: Doreen C.
ube waffle.review:
Came here on a Saturday afternoon after seeing pictures of this place on Instagram. 
It's a super cute little coffee shop, lots of ppl at work on their laptops, cute art/decor, and for sure looks like a good place to post up and get some work done.

I had the avocado toast and soy sea salt caramel latte - both delicious! 

The toast is on a fat piece of bread - really it's quite simple, just avocado, a gooey egg, and crushed red pepper -- however, it cost almost $9. Extremely pricey for what you are getting, hence the 4 star! 

Coffee was perfect temperature and not super strong (which I prefer), no complaints there!

Staff is also super nice and friendly, always a plus!

Would come back to do work and try other unique items like the Ube waffle! Only con is the price.

excerpts: , I had an Ube waffle order...
it wasn't very good, and really pricey.
But the thing that was really annoying was, while surveying the menu, the lady behind the counter kept looking me and my girlfriend up and down in a judge-y way.
I'm not sure why...
I made sure nobody else was in line waiting while we looked at the menu, just to be sure we weren't holding up a line.
I won;t be going back.
ube waffle.author: Ara A.
ube waffle.review: I recently visited for some breakfast. The coffee was OK but small and bitter, I had an Ube waffle order... it wasn't very good, and really pricey. But the thing that was really annoying was, while surveying the menu, the lady behind the counter kept looking me and my girlfriend up and down in a judge-y way. I'm not sure why... I made sure nobody else was in line waiting while we looked at the menu, just to be sure we weren't holding up a line. I won;t be going back.
